column2: Ready to do some more exploring with Lightspeed?
Okay, so this time, you need to pass Level 2. Go ahead and play Level 2.

Oof. A bit difficult, right? This level has some rough edges to say the least! But you can smooth things out.

Press the Flip button on the left.
There. Now click on the lock to unlock the panel and let's get this party started!
Okay, so now that you have access to this panel, do you see any settings you can change to make the level easier?
If things are too fast, what can you change to fix that?
How about slowing down the player's ship by lowering its `speed`?
Don't forget that you actually need to beat the level. Press the Flip button and play through the level.
All right. Play the level and let's see.
Hopefully this works. If not, go back and change the speed to something lower.
Brilliant solution! That worked like a dream! You're really getting the hang of it!
I'm going to give you the Level 2 key for Lightspeed. Remember: With great power comes great responsibility!
That key gives you access to the coding panel. A whole new level for your training!
